name: A Wilhelm Scream - Partycrasher / Propagandhi / Light Years
description:
EDIT: Got a few extras in with the A Wilhelm Scream LPs - all great, check them out.

The new album by the awesome A Wilhelm Scream! 11 tracks of epic skate punk thrash punk rock greatness!

Vinyl is coloured (unspecified as yet) and comes with download code.

PLEASE NOTE: Shipping price is for the vinyl version - if you want the CD, I'll refund you the difference. I'm waiting to get these from the States, so as soon as I get them, I'll ship them to you. Expected second week November.

Tracklisting:
1. Boat Builders
2. The Last Laugh
3. Devil Don't Know
4. Number One
5. Gut Sick Companion
6. Hairy Scarecrow
7. Ice Man Left a Trail
8. Sassaquin
9. Walkin' With Michael Douglas
10. Wild Turkey
11. Born a Wise Man 

Propagandhi - How To Clean Everything (20th Anniversary Edition)
The vinyl re-issue of Propagandhi's classic debut album - essential for any punk rock fan.

Light Years - I Wont Hold This Against You
Great pop punk band from the US, released this summer on Paper and Plastick.

name: Fun Pack!
description:
Disconnect Disconnect Records are proud to announce our latest release - the Disconnect Disconnect 'Fun Pack'! 

Fun Packs is a new project bringing back a love of all things 80's and 90's, a great time for toys, games, movies and music.

In each pack is a download code for a new EP from the creator of the 'Punk Goes 8-Bit' series, featuring (old school Nintendo / computer game style) 8-bit covers of tracks by NOFX, Bad Religion, Strung Out and Goldfinger!

Along with this, your pack will be stuffed full of great stuff from the 80's and 90's including toys such as Monster In My Pocket, M.U.S.C.L.E., Micro Machines, POGS and Tazo, along with stickers and trading cards from Hook, Terminator 2, Superman, TMNT, Masters Of The Universe, Toxic Crusaders, Nintendo, Back To The Future, ALF, Gremlins and much more!

Pick up a pack and see what you'll get in your pack! Great for a gift, or simply for a bit of nostalgia!

name: The Human Project - Origins
description: The Human Project's debut album show them to be one of the UK's best melodic punk rock / skatepunk bands. If you like your punk rock, fast, heavy, riffy with big choruses, you'll definitely love these guys.

name: We Still Dream / Still Rings True LPs
description:
A couple of brand new releases from our buddies at Anchor Eighty Four Records in the States. 

We Still Dream's 'Something To Smile About' is a great slab of melodic pop punk from this up and coming band and comes on green swirl vinyl.

Still Rings True have been a long time favourite of the label and their self titled album is full of fast paced punk rock and hardcore tracks. Comes on blue vinyl.

name: Implants - From Chaos To Order
description:
If you're a fan of the Epi-Fat skate punk sound, this is the ultimate band for you! Formed from members of bands such as PULLEY, TEN FOOT POLE, STRUNG OUT and DEATH BY STEREO - you know these guys are going to be great. 

Sweet clear vinyl record with lyric insert.

name: Stickup Kid - Future Fire
description:
The new album from Disconnect Disconnect favourites Stickup Kid, and follow up to the 'Nothing About Me' 7" we released over here. 'Future Fire' further cements the bands place as one of the top US pop punk bands.

Comes on nice yellow vinyl.

name: Straightaway - Last Exit To Nowhere
description: The first album from French melodic skate punkers Straightaway since 2007's 'Democracy of Spreading Poverty', and what a comeback! Another great release coming out of the Effervescence stable.

name: Home Advantage - Cadet
description:
The debut EP from London's top pop punk band Home Advantage. Bringing to mind the best pop punk and punk rock of the golden years of Drive Thru and Fat Wreck Chords, Cadet shows a band with deep routes in the classic punk rock of their youth, but also blending in some newer influences to create a fresh pop punk record which should appeal to fans of the punk rock scene of the early 2000's and today.

Tracklisting:

1. Short-Termism
2. Youth Theatre
3. Markers From Home
4. Ropeswing
5. (The Sands Of) San Lorenzo
6. Barriers

name: Banquets - Banquets
description:
The new album from New Jersey's melodic punk rockers Banquets is  here! 10 tracks of great singalong punk rock which fans of bands like The Gaslight Anthem, Hot Rod Circuit and Hot Water Music are going to love!

Tracklisting:

 1. Little Shallow
 2. Big Big Waves
 3. Call It A Comeback
 4. Paths
 5. March 19th
 6. Starts And Stops
 7. Fade From Gold
 8. Burns In The Breeze
 9. The Flicker And The Flame
 10. Daggers

name: After The Fall - Unkind
description:
On March 19th, Disconnect Disconnect is proud to release the Euro edition of the new album from Albany, NY's After The Fall. 'Unkind' is the 4th album from these long time favourites of the label, and sits in between the technical skate punk sound of 2nd album 'Fort Orange' and the more aggressive third album 'Eradication', creating a great album, sure to be one of the punk rock releases of 2013.

Please check out the album closer 'Decade' at Paper and Plastick's Soundcloud page below. 

https://soundcloud.com/paperandplastick/after-the-fall-decade

Paper and Plastick are releasing the album on vinyl / digital, with us at Disconnect Disconnect bringing you the album on CD.

The album is available to order now.

Tracklisting:

1. Unkind
2. Tilberg
3. Disunion
4. Wrong
5. Controlled
6. Attention Dependent
7. Writers’ Block
8. Back and Forth
9. Double Negative
10. Screwers
11. Cathedral
12. Decade

name: The Real Danger - Down And Out
description:
We're lucky to get the great brand new album from one of Europe's top punk rock bands, The Real Danger. Playing melodic punk rock in the vein of Descendents, and mixed and mastered by the legend himself Stephen Egerton of Descendents / ALL, so it sounds really great! I love this band - you should too!

Tracklisting:
01. Work it out
02. Anything
03. The guessing game
04. Pyramids
05. Can’t stand
06. One thing
07. Not the only one
08. What if
09. Swann street
10. Tough love
11. Down and out
12. Summer’s gone

Note: The default shipping is for the LP version - if you buy the CD, i'll refund the postage difference.

name: Lipona - Networks
description:
The new album by Florida's experimental melodic hardcore masters Lipona is out now on Disconnect Disconnect Records. Taking their skate punk roots and adding their unique atmospheric and experimental stylings, Lipona combine the aggression and technicality of Propagandhi with the emotion of Brand New to create one of the best and original punk rock records of 2012.

Limited to 250 LPs on white vinyl, complete with insert and download.

Tracklisting:

1. Followers
2. The River
3. Rights Of Passage
4. Breakthrough
5. Civilized
6. Comfort
7. The Last
8. On Giants
9. Distance
10. Collapse

name: The Fear / Egos At The Door / Drones
description:
The debut album from Yorkshire punk rock band The Fear is here to melt your faces with a great blend of riffs and melodies.

Egos play fast math / skate / indie / hardcore / punk rock stuff, whilst Drones play more of the punk rock sound known from bands like Anti Flag and Strike Anywhere.

All highly recommended, released by our good mates at Lockjaw.

options.name: Egos At The Door - Blankets Of Denial

name: Black Numbers BARGAINS
description:
We've got some great LPs in from our friends in the States, the awesome Black Numbers Records. Some of these are only available through us in the UK and all are priced as cheap as possible! Select from the drop down list!

Grey Area / Luther / The Copyrights / The Reveling - Split - Awesome split release featuring Luther whose Siblings and Sevens CD we put out, along with melodic hardcore legends Grey Area, pop punk heroes The Copyrights and melodic punk upstarts The Reveling.

No Motiv - Winterlong - Great new release from these punk rock / emo heroes. Great to have them back!

Static Radio NJ - We Are All Beasts - The latest from the great Static Radio, bringing another full length full of great punk rock tunes.

The Reveling - Tributaries - Debut LP from this super new melodic punk rock band, fans of The Gaslight Anthem, The Loved Ones etc, this is the band for you!

options.name: Grey Area / Luther / The Copyrights / The Reveling - Split
Static Radio NJ - We Are All Beasts

name: Stickup Kid - Nothing About Me
description:
The first pressing for Nothing About Me, the awesome new 5 track 7" from California's Stickup Kid. 500 records split between three different colors: Red, Blue, and Black, of which we have the Blue (/150) exclusive for the UK. Adeline Records are covering the rest of the release, but we've been lucky to get 10 limited bundle packs featuring the black and red versions too for all you collectors out there!

Track Listing:

1) Breathing

2) Lighthouse

3) Dreaming Of Kenny Rogers

4) You Are Captain Hook

5) The Weather Outside Is Weather

name: Rebuke - Artie Kaye
description:
The new 7" from Sweden's finest, Rebuke!

Limited to 200 copies, 100 black and 100 yellow - half available from us and half from the band on the road. Comes with digital download and sticker. 

1. It Really Stinks In Here
2. Black Screen, Eyes
3. Bandname and URL Withheld
4. Operation Shitstorm

name: Disconnect Disconnect Records - Removals
description:
Many many months in the making, our new compilation 'Removals' is here! Featuring 21 of our favourite bands and acts from around the world with all previously unreleased tracks - with new songs, demos, acoustic tracks and covers all included. Pick this up and discover some new favourite bands! 

Artwork by William Exley (who did the t shirt). Free postage with any other item.

Tracklisting:
1) Uncommonmenfrommars – Jim Got In A Fight With Brian Molko
2) Hit The Switch – Retroactive
3) IVS – Storm Warning
4) Our Time Down Here – Under Dim Light
5) Counterpunch – Blue Skies
6) The Fear – Great News For Typists
7) Booze Cruise – I Said Light Cream Cheese, Not Light On The Cream Cheese
8) 3 Cards Short – Ashitaka
9) Harker – Loyal Than Most
10) The Stereo State – Altamont
11) Rebuke – Libertine
12) Samuel Caldwells Revenge – The REAL Lost Boys Of Sudan
13) After The Fall – Forgive And Forget
14) Darko – The Smarter I Think I Am The Dumber I Get
15) Caleb Lionheart – We’re Rooted Here and You Can’t Pull Us Up
16) She Likes Todd – Explode
17) Friends With The Enemy – Waking Up
18) Versus The World – In Fear Of Finale
19) Overtime Heroes – Open Hands
20) The Braces – What Happened
21) PJ Bond – Solitude

name: Disconnect Disconnect T Shirts
description:
The first Disconnect Disconnect Records t shirt! Only 30 of these printed by the good people at Get A Grip on Organic Anvil high quality t shirts. A variety of sizes and colours - some limited to just one!

Get an awesome looking t shirt and help spread the word of the label!

All shirts have a black print. Shirt colours are White, River Blue, Natural (between white and gray?) and Haze (yellow).

EDIT:

I have also found out a few tour t shirts from some of our bands Rebuke and 7 Years Bad Luck - so pick one up cheap!

options.name: Medium Mens 7 Years Bad Luck Shirt (Black)
Small Mens 7 Years Bad Luck Shirt (Black)

name: Jet Market - Sparks Against Darkness
description:
The new album from Italy's finest skate punk band is one that's going to take them from one of Europes top bands into a recognised name of every self respecting skate punk fan worldwide!

Featuring 14 tracks of technical, melodic, fast and anthemic punk rock, 'Sparks Against Darkness' is going to blow you away!

01. Lame Attempts At Improving A Lost Art
02. My Deep Black Nights
03. 15 Hundred Miles For A 15 People Show
04. Aiming High
05. Sparks Against Darkness
06. You Can Always Make My Day
07. Used To The Worst
08. The Missing Link
09. Don't Say You're Sorry. Because You're Not
10. Wayfarers
11. As Tides Change
12. Hate Is Baggage
13. Expectations VS Facts

name: This Is A Standoff - Be Delighted
description:
The awesome new EP from Canadian punk rock heroes This Is A Standoff, the follow up to 'Be Disappointed'. Pick this up in time for their Euro tour through September!

Out 1st September. 

1) We're Really Doing It
2) The Enlightened One
3) Head In The Sand
4) See You At The Bottom
5) Vanadian

name: Luther - Siblings and Sevens
description:
The debut release from this great band from Philadelphia. 7 tracks of melodic indie / punk rock goodness sure to delight fans of bands like The Get Up Kids, Hot Rod Circuit and Jimmy Eat World. CD has great professionally cut card sleeves in a variety of colours, limited to 200 copies, and all hand numbered for individuality.

Out 29/8/11

Tracklisting:
1) Siblings and Sevens
2) This Is Like Fight Club
3) Two Anglers
4) The Suitor
5) There's Always Money...
6) The Communion
7) Aztec Tomb

name: Radicus - The Bigger Noise
description:
The awesome mini album from Radicus is 8 tracks of powerful melodic hardcore from one of the top UK punk bands. These 8 tracks are sure to delight fans of bands such as A Wilhelm Scream, Strung Out and Comeback Kid.

1. Family Fortunes
2. O Dejay God
3. My Legacy (The History To Come)
4. The Spark II
5. 2 Legit 2 Quit
6. Business As Usual
7. MVP
8. Let Them Try!

name: Counterpunch - Heroes & Ghosts
description:
The new album by Chicago punk rock heroes Counterpunch is a mix of hard hitting in your face punk rock and pop punk gems!

Produced by Mark Michalik, who has produced all The Swellers albums, Counterpunch take the pop punk sensibilities of The Swellers and even early day Fall Out Boy, and mix it up with some hard hitting melodic hardcore which will leave fans of Much The Same and Bigwig in heaven. 

Press:

'Combining a powerful, gritty sound with driving melodies and hooks, the 4-piece bring to the table a style reminiscent of The Swellers, with all the drive and gusto of Rise Against' 
AlterThePress.com

'If you like The Swellers and EpiFat bands of the 90s, you will like this. Guaranteed.'
Punktastic.com

Released 11th October 2010.

1. Heroes & Ghosts
2. High Tide For Internal Strife
3. The Great Regression
4. And Everybody's Right (Asshole)
5. Constraints and Anchors
6. When The Curtains Close
7. We Believe
8. March Of The Paper Tiger
9. Strings Of Destiny
10. Sweet and Sour
11. A Raven's Curse
12. Parasites
13. So Long

name: Rebuke - Wouldworks
description:
The new album from Swedish skate punk heroes Rebuke, 'Wouldworks' is sure to be one of the top melodic hardcore albums of the year! 14 blistering tracks of melodic hardcore, bringing to mind bands from Propagandhi to This Is A Standoff. 

Press:

'a turbo-charged highly-enjoyable listen from start to finish' 
4/5 Big Cheese Magazine

'This is tech-y skate-punk at it's best - this record has more riffs and solos than some bands write in an entire career'
Punktastic.com

'An incendiary, yet melodic 31-minute assault from a Swedish quartet that brings to mind a very young Strung Out/NOFX mix'
Sputnikmusic.com

Released 5th April 2010.

Length: 31:17min

1. Bartenders & Tarbenders 
2. History Doesn't Repeat Itself... We Repeat History 
3. Wings 
4. Wings II: The Bastard Idioms 
5. Affection, Abandon, Affliction 
6. Gonzales 
7. Death-defining Stunts 
8. Take to the Seas 
9. Snow Day 
10. (It's Not) Rocket Surgery 
11. His Brittle Faith 
12. Still Weather 
13. Wings III: Driving the Point Home 
14. Mission Solved, Problem Accomplished

name: Company L - Company L
description:
The debut EP from South London's Company L, showcases the bands beginning with 3 remixed demo tracks along with 3 new studio recordings. Combining a love of bands like Consumed, Pennywise and Propagandhi, Company L's debut is the perfect starting point for the UK's best new punk band. 

Press:

‘Fast, politically poignant and marks a terrific one-up for British post-skate punk’  5/5 Big Cheese

‘Short, Sharp and a good debut’  3.5/5 Punktastic.com

‘A confident, solid start’  A Short Fanzine About Rocking

‘Utilising blistering riffs, rhythms and right-on refrains to impressive effect’  Kerrang!

Released 12th April 2010.

1. Back To The Drawing Board
2. Flight FR5732
3. Back When Nick Griffin Was Gay
4. WWJD
5. Policing The Police
6. Isinglass
